title: The Protectors: A Blue History Novel
description: Blue Bloods have special characteristics.They stop aging at a random point in their lives, and they have a unique ability ranging from telekinesis to fire wielding. There are two different organizations of Blue Bloods. The good one is the Protectors and the evil one is the Destroyers. My name is Waves Calden. Join me as I recount joining the Protectors and the struggle to save the country.
author: Jeremy Sandlin
